thread.title: Mr. JACEK LASZKIEWICZ
thread.title_full: SkyLux Travel reviewed by Mr. JACEK LASZKIEWICZ

author: Mr. JACEK LASZKIEWICZ
title: Mr. JACEK LASZKIEWICZ
text:
overall, a very good and personalized service. Agent very polite and professional. Some technicalities of issuing e-ticket were rather unknown to me, but overall good experience.
It took around 12 hours for an e-ticket to be released. Then it was sent to my email, but with no Quote: d price attached. Hmm... This was something I am not a custom to. Eventually my AMEX indicated the purchased prince. Few bucks hire though due to the US - CDN dollar exchange rate.
